text: Merimeri Penfold (née Roberts, 26 May 1920 – 1 April 2014) was a New Zealand Māori educator. She is thought to have been the first Māori woman to teach Māori language at a New Zealand university. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New Zealand Category:New Zealand educators Category:People from North Island Category:New Zealand Māori people
title: Merimeri Penfold
